(

    STATUS              VARCHAR2(4),

    REG_DATE                 DATE,
    COMPLATE_DATE            DATE,
    DELETE_DATE              DATE,

	PARCEL_NUMBER       VARCHAR2(40),

	PARCEL_COMPANY_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
	PARCEL_COMPANY_TYPE VARCHAR2(2),
	PRODUCT_NUMBER		VARCHAR2(2000),
	PAYLOAD				VARCHAR2(2000),
	PAYLOAD_TYPE        VARCHAR2(20),
	USERID				VARCHAR2(11),
	USERGB				VARCHAR2(3),
	QUOTA_DATE			DATE,

	PUSH_COMPANY_ID     VARCHAR2(11),
	PUSH_USER_ID        VARCHAR2(11),

;
